data.name: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
data.detailed_description:
The MEG has shut down their HUB access!

As we have warned on the YT Livestream and elsewhere, the MEG Major Explorers Group has shut down their base in the HUB thereby taking away instant access to all levels until you have gotten there naturally on your own at which time they will grant access to that level from their base in the HUB.

However, they have been kind enough to let us use a simulation of all levels which can be accessed in Sandbox mode. You will not gain achievements, pictures, bobbleheads, etc., but can freely come and go as you please.


About the Game

No-Clip Out Of Reality and Into BrVR

Explore~Scavenge~Survive

NOTE TO VALVE INDEX USERS: The inputs are using a community-made binding which makes it possible for Valve Index users to play. If you're still having issues you may need to remap your controllers. Please contact us on our discord (https://discord.gg/qm2mx2cdHh) if you have any issues or if you just want to say hi!

BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality is an action-adventure survival game based on The Backrooms, a popular internet creepypasta. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor, elevator, wall, stairs, etc., in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia. Explore the liminal spaces, survive the entities, scavenge for food, supplies, and weapons, craft items to trade, and try to survive. There is a No Gore mode as well as a no entities mode to allow you to play the experience you seek. We have tried to recreate all of your favorite levels: The Main 9, Level Run for your life, Level 188, The Terror Hotel, Level Fun, The Snackrooms, The Poolrooms, The Sh4dy Gr3y, Kitty's House, The End and so much more. There are mini-games like The Terror Hotel Casino, Skin or No Skin, Backrooms Brawl, Ski Ball, General StarFlares Laser Game, The Charleston Button, Basketball, Squirt Gun Madness, Backrooms Fruit Finale, Music Sequencer, and many more. These levels are complete with bases, outposts, communities, pawn shops, breweries, museums, farmer's markets, and crafting/upgrade workshops. There are also 50+ in-game achievements to accomplish giving you hours of playability. Please note that this game is in Early Access so please leave reviews accordingly. Bugs and general jank should be expected and we may have to wipe data at times. We are very responsive developers and would love to have you on our Discord to help shape the game and work out any issues you may be having. We still have placeholder assets in use that we will eventually replace. Thank you to all the artists whose assets we have used as it has allowed us to work even harder on other areas of the game and do it on a shoestring budget. We are a two-person team not asset flippers. Welcome to the family!

BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality features:

- Physics-based avatar that uses VRGK. Full body or hands only.
- Explore 70+ immersive levels with or without entities
- Enjoy 80+ interactable items to use while exploring, surviving, or in combat
- Slay entities to progress forward and don't let them catch you!
- Multiple cameras to make videos with; we've got you streamers!
- Control cameras and sound effects from the keyboard
- Build traps to catch entities
- Lots of fun mini-games
- Craft items, shelters, and weapons to help you survive with scavenged materials
- Trade with NPCs to gain valuable items
- Upgrade benches allow you to make better items
- There are three difficulty modes
- Liquid brewers allow you to create new substances and items such as fortified almond water and friendship potions
- Befriend entities and let them fight for you
- There is a sandbox mode where you can spawn items at will, meet the entities, and tinker with backrooms objects
- There's a no gore/no entities mode where you can freely survive among the backrooms
- Cut down trees (we don't promote deforestation) to make shacks
- A front rooms area where you can pick out your loadout and then no-clip into the backrooms
- A vault in your front rooms to store items you've found, achievements you've completed, and special items you've collected
- "Dark" levels, a serious challenge with 4 times the entities, more darkness, murky water, and heightened danger
- Find ways to make Backrooms Bucks
- Meme-friendly environment

THE HUB WILL BE LOCKED DOWN AS OF THE NEXT PATCH.
You will still be able to access it in sandbox mode, but you won't get your achievements and items.

We stream new features, playtesting, gameplay, and walkthroughs of the game 5 days a week on YouTube.
Discord Link: https://discord.gg/qm2mx2cdHh

This game includes flashing/disorienting lights, blood effects, fantasy violence, and potentially disturbing/creepy content. We are not responsible for any injuries received during the game. There are no teleport or comfort settings at this time. There are jump scares and memes!

data.short_description: BrVR Backrooms VR is an action-adventure survival game based on The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor, wall, stairs, etc., in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 3500 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Copyright 2022 Lakeside Central LLC dba Woo Studios

content_descriptors.notes: There are weapons in the game like knives, grenades, flamethrowers, and guns which can kill enemies (The entities). The entities ragdoll. Blood particles are present, and there is a red flash when you respawn. Some items also allow you to blow stuff up.You can simulate gambling. There is also a No Gore and No entites mode.
